entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is the person to whom Professor Trelawney is speaking. She is timid and asks questions.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a Seer who has been insulted by the establishment. She is angry and emotional.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney is speaking to Parvati, who asks her questions about the insults she has received.
